title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Agentic AI Meets responsible AI: Strategy and best practices (AIM422)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 智能体AI遇见负责任AI：策略与最佳实践 (AIM422)
abstract: AI agents offer powerful capabilities and require thoughtful design to help manage risks. This session explores responsible agentic AI implementation with appropriate controls and governance. Understand some of the scientific frontiers that inform design considerations, including the language of AI agents, context management, agent interactions, and common sense reasoning. Learn approaches for human oversight, risk mitigation, evaluation methods, and control mechanisms to help align agent behaviors with organizational goals, and help make agentic AI both effective and trustworthy.
abstract_cn: AI智能体提供强大的功能，需要经过深思熟虑的设计来帮助管理风险。本次会议探讨负责任的智能体AI实施，包括适当的控制和治理。了解一些指导设计考虑的科学前沿，包括AI智能体的语言、上下文管理、智能体交互和常识推理。学习人工监督、风险缓解、评估方法和控制机制的方法，以帮助将智能体行为与组织目标保持一致，并帮助使智能体AI既有效又值得信赖。
